result.name: gb-tourism-survey
result.notes:
Annual official statistic measuring the volume and value of domestic overnight tourism in Britain.  Jointly sponsored by Visit England, Visit Scotland and Visit Wales. Publication schedule for monthly results is at http://www.visitengland.org/Images/Continuous%20surveys_2013_v7_tcm30-32182.pdf

All current survey deliverables (including online data browser) are at http://www.visitengland.org/insight-statistics/major-tourism-surveys/overnightvisitors/index.aspx
result.title: GB Tourism Survey

extras.value: The data is complex (multiple levels and within levels, multiple stages) - a bespoke database is produced for use with analysis programme Reports for Surveys, requiring specialist training, i.e. cannot be used without an RfS licence and specific database training. This means that at present there is no single dataset which could be released. However,  work is currently underway to produce a microdata set for delivery to Eurostat, scheduled for September, and once finalised, this will be published on the  Visit England (VE)  website (subject to agreemeint by other sponsoring boards). VE will review formats of current deliverables (mainly pdf) to explore scope to additionally publish in other formats.
